item.title: 切换博客主题 & 阶段性整理原有主题修改
item.description: This file is created to record problems and changes I have met in the next commit. The theme of my blog will be changed from Diary to Learn after this commit. Process Name Record Time Switch theme start 2021.01.03 Review old changes More customize Changes

item.title: Universal Post Title
item.description: Used for test May contains bugs about 1️⃣😄 Emoji Cheetsheet When $a \ne 0$, there are two solutions to (ax^2 + bx + c = 0) and they are $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$ Internal params (like .Summary) WILL CAUSE SUMMARY ERROR A bunch of code here render of `code` bug: ` code `
